reviews.review_msg: Best prof I've ever had. Incredibly kind, caring, and approachable. I learned so much from this course and would 100% take a course with him again!

A great prof, through and through. Dr. Small made it his goal to be kind and create a welcoming environment in his classes. He tends to fall a bit behind in his lectures but it is so obvious he loves teaching and wants students to succeed. Super accessible after class and by email and makes sure you feel respected and heard!

Will is awesome! I thoroughly enjoyed his class, thought the material was comprehensive & interesting, assignments were relevant to our future practice & fairly graded, and lectures were engaging. 10/10, would take a class with him any time.
